snippet.title: [Extended Trailer] Slasher U: A Horror Movie Dating Sim, Act 1
snippet.description:
An extended recut trailer with a LOT more Act 1 gameplay! (Hey, it's twice as long now. Go ahead. Make your jokes.)
You can check out Act 1 of Slasher U on Steam or Itch.io! You'll have to be logged into Steam to have a look-see!

Thanks for making the last 6 months the most kickass itchio launch (and, as of last week, Steam launch) ever!! I could do this without y'all :'))
xoxoxo, Professor Plutonium

Slasher U dev website:
https://slasheru.neocities.org/

Slasher U tumblr:
https://slasheru.tumblr.com/
